abstract: The cable company is said to be in negotiations with General Electric to create a separate company, merging Comcast’s programming assets with NBC Universal.
snippet: The cable company is said to be in negotiations with General Electric to create a separate company, merging Comcast’s programming assets with NBC Universal.
lead_paragraph: Five years after Comcast’s failed bid for the Walt Disney Company, Brian L. Roberts is again looking to fulfill his long-sought dream of turning his cable company into a major media conglomerate.

headline.main: In NBC Universal Bid, Comcast Seeks an Empire
headline.print_headline: In NBC Universal Bid, Comcast Seeks an Empire

byline.original: By Bill Carter and Brian Stelter

abstract: Comcast is in negotiations with General Electric to create a separate company, merging Comcast’s programming assets with NBC Universal, The New York Times reported.
snippet: Comcast is in negotiations with General Electric to create a separate company, merging Comcast’s programming assets with NBC Universal, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Five years after Comcast’s failed bid for the Walt Disney Company, Brian L. Roberts is again looking to fulfill his long-sought dream of turning his cable company into a major media conglomerate.

headline.main: In NBC Universal Bid, Comcast Seeks an Empire
